scripts.build-linux: pkg dist/index.js -t node12-linux-x64 -o ./bin/linux/gitlab-ci-local && gzip -c bin/linux/gitlab-ci-local > bin/linux.gz
scripts.build-macos: pkg dist/index.js -t node12-macos-x64 -o ./bin/macos/gitlab-ci-local && gzip -c bin/macos/gitlab-ci-local > bin/macos.gz
scripts.build-win: pkg dist/index.js -t node12-win-x64 -o ./bin/win/gitlab-ci-local && gzip -c bin/win/gitlab-ci-local.exe > bin/win.gz
scripts.build-all: npm run build-linux && npm run build-macos && npm run build-win
scripts.check-all: npm run build && npm run --silent lint && npm audit --parseable && npm run ncu
scripts.test-yml-spec: node -r source-map-support/register dist/index.js manual manual_job_invoked_from_cli --cwd tests/test-yml-spec
scripts.test-exec-never-job: node -r source-map-support/register dist/index.js exec never_job --cwd tests/test-yml-spec
